channel.title: Anime on Christopher Fu
channel.description: Recent content in Anime on Christopher Fu

item.title: Code Geass Ep. 23-24
item.description: Things I liked: The killing off of Euphemia was done well, even if the events leading up to it were sort of contrived (it seems weird that Lelouch would bring up “killing all Japanese” out of nowhere). It really raises the stakes now. CC’s mecha pilot outfit looks nice. Cornelia’s betrayal: Classic plot twist done nicely. Things I didn’t like: I never noticed this before, but Kallen’s mecha pilot outfit looks outrageous: I’m not sure what the Britannian military’s plan is with using Lancelot.
